SEARCH
Package org.lwjgl.vulkan

Class VkRenderingInfoKHR

java.lang.Object
org.lwjgl.system.Pointer.Default
org.lwjgl.system.Struct
org.lwjgl.vulkan.VkRenderingInfo
org.lwjgl.vulkan.VkRenderingInfoKHR
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable, NativeResource, Pointer
public class VkRenderingInfoKHR extends VkRenderingInfo
See VkRenderingInfo.

Layout


 struct VkRenderingInfoKHR {
     VkStructureType sType;
     void const * pNext;
     VkRenderingFlags flags;
     VkRect2D renderArea;
     uint32_t layerCount;
     uint32_t viewMask;
     uint32_t colorAttachmentCount;
     VkRenderingAttachmentInfo const * pColorAttachments;
     VkRenderingAttachmentInfo const * pDepthAttachment;
     VkRenderingAttachmentInfo const * pStencilAttachment;
 }

  • Constructor Details

    • VkRenderingInfoKHR

      public VkRenderingInfoKHR(ByteBuffer container)
      Creates a VkRenderingInfoKHR instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

      The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
